<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> High Command

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns selected groups in [[High Command|high command]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''hcAllGroups''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - commander

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hcAllGroups]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[High Command]],[[hcGroupParams]],[[hcLeader]],[[hcRemoveAllGroups]],[[hcRemoveGroup]],[[hcSelected]],[[hcSelectGroup]],[[hcSetGroup]],[[hcShowBar]],[[hcShownBar]],[[onHCGroupSelectionChanged]]
</value></part></template>
